attributes.action: Lift restrictions to allow beauty, nails and holistic businesses to re-open
attributes.additional_details: As the UK's largest trade body for the professional beauty industry, The Beauty Guild believes that there is no scientific reason why nail, holistic and beauty services cannot be provided in a Covid-secure way providing that they complete detailed treatment risk assessments and comply with the Government guidelines. We therefore ask that they be allowed to do so as soon as possible, along with hairdressers and barbers. Our industry is well prepared and ready to re-open safely.
attributes.background: Nail bars, holistic therapy centres, beauty salons and training schools are prepared and ready to re-open and operate in a Covid-secure way as soon as possible.
